tier.item: (11) ku nelppanci-nun kili-ka 3m i-ko phok-i 30cm i-ko
that board-top length-nom 3m be-conj width-nom 30cm be-conj
`That board is 3m long, 30cm wide, and 3cm thick.'
(11) ku nelppanci-nun kili-ka 3m i-ko phok-i 30cm i-ko
that board-top length-nom 3m be-conj width-nom 30cm be-conj
`That board is 3m long, 30cm wide, and 3cm thick.'
ku nelppanci-nun kili-ka 3m i-ko phok-i 30cm i-ko twukkey-ka 3cm i-ta.
that board-top length-nom 3m be-conj width-nom 30cm be-conj thickness-nom 3cm be-decl
That board is 3m long, 30cm wide, and 3cm thick.
`The hole on the ceiling is deep.' = [length +directional downward +]
`The hole on the ceiling is deep.' = [length +directional downward +]
The hole on the ceiling is deep.
`The hole on the wall is deep.' = [length +directional downward +]
`The hole on the wall is deep.' = [length +directional downward +]
The hole on the wall is deep.
b. ku ciksakakhyeng-uy swupyeng pyen-un kili-ka 5cm i-ta.
that rectangle-gen horizontal line-top length-nom 5cm be-decl
`The horizontal line of that rectangle is 5cm long.'

a. ku nelppanci-nun phok-i 2m i-ko, kiphi-ka 30cm i-ko

`The board is 2m wide, 30cm deep, and 3cm thick.'
